pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate the Periodogram of a Time-Course // Provides a consistent interface to use various methods to calculate the periodogram and estimate the period of a rhythmic time-course. Methods include Lomb-Scargle, fast Fourier transform, and three versions of the chi-square periodogram. See Tackenberg and Hughey (2021) doi:10.1371/journal.pcbi.1008567.
